sentences.sContent: The West Ham crest features two crossed rivet hammers and the club has been known has the Hammers ever since
sentences.sContent_eng: The West Ham crest features two crossed rivet hammers and the club has been known has the Hammers ever since
sentences.sCn: 球队的队徽上有两个交叉的铆钉锤，这也让人们把球队和铁锤联系在一起。

synos.tran: 铆接；固定；（把目光、注意力等）集中于

phrases.pCn: 制铆钉机；铆钉机；拉钉机

words.tran: 用铆钉固定；集中于…（rivet的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: a metal pin used to fasten pieces of metal together

trans.tranCn: 铆接；固定；（把目光、注意力等）集中于
